Article Title: IPL 2025 Points Table: Latest standings after PBKS vs LSG match at HPCA stadium in Dharamsala
Article Text:
Image credit: BCCI/IPL

Go Beyond The Boundary with our YouTube channel. SUBSCRIBE NOW!

Bombay Sport Exchange Ep 4: Prof. Ratnakar Shetty on BCCI, cricket politics & Indian cricket's growth

Punjab Kings climbed to second place on the IPL 2025 points table after their dominant 37-run win over Lucknow Super Giants at the HPCA Stadium in Dharamsala on Sunday. This victory marked PBKS‚Äô seventh win of the season from 11 matches, taking their points tally to 15. With three losses and one no-result, they now sit just behind table-toppers Royal Challengers Bengaluru, who have 16 points from 11 games.RCB continue to lead the pack with 8 wins and 3 losses, boasting a healthy net run rate (NRR) of +0.482. While Punjab Kings also have only three defeats, their NRR of +0.376 places them narrowly below RCB.Mumbai Indians, with 7 wins and 4 losses from 11 matches, are third with 14 points, but their impressive NRR of +1.274 ‚Äî the best among all teams ‚Äî gives them a strong edge if points get tied later in the tournament.Gujarat Titans follow closely in fourth with 14 points from 10 games, thanks to their consistent form and a solid NRR of +0.867.Delhi Capitals are holding the fifth spot with 12 points from 10 matches and remain in the hunt for a top-four finish.Kolkata Knight Riders, with 11 points from 11 matches, are still in the playoff race but need a strong finish.Lucknow Super Giants‚Äô defeat to PBKS hurt their playoff chances, leaving them on 10 points from 11 games and a negative NRR of -0.469, which could be crucial in a tight finish.Rajasthan Royals and Chennai Super Kings have been eliminated from playoff contention. RR have just 3 wins from 12 matches, while CSK, surprisingly, sit at the bottom with only 2 wins from 11 games and a poor NRR of -1.117.Sunrisers Hyderabad are also struggling with 3 wins from 10 games and an NRR of -1.192, making their path to the playoffs extremely difficult.
Article Summary: Punjab kings climb to second place on the ipl 2025 points table. Royal challengers bengaluru lead the pack with 16 points from 11 games. Rajasthan royals and chennai super kings have been eliminated from playoff contention. Delhi capitals are holding the fifth spot with 12 points from 10 matches.

Article Title: Mike Matheson: ‚ÄúExcited to help the team reach new highs‚Äù: Mike Matheson keeps Montreal Canadiens on their toes as he gets set for World Championship
Article Text:
Mike Matheson (via Getty Images)



Mike Matheson highlights leadership role, commits to offseason push at World Championship



The ‚ÄúSAD ENDING‚Äù To The Montreal Canadiens Season

Emily Matheson's legacy boosts Mike Matheson‚Äôs World Championship adventure



While there was optimism in the air during the Montreal Canadiens ' end-of-year media availability, veteran defenseman Mike Matheson presented a tempered view. The 31-year-old blue liner, who had a crucial role to play all season long, accepted the progress made by the team but made it clear that the actual work only recently began.In spite of logging big minutes during the 2024‚Äì25 NHL campaign, Mike Matheson was nowhere near slowing down and continuing to test his limits.Referencing the Montreal Canadiens‚Äô first playoff appearance since beginning their rebuild, Mike Matheson admitted they didn't achieve the ultimate goal, as Stanley Cup champions, according to him, is the true NHL success. He thinks that if the Montreal Canadiens want to repeat this year's success without evolving, they're going to get a wake-up call.‚ÄúIt‚Äôs fun for me to have that responsibility; I know it‚Äôs important to our team that I take those minutes and do as much as I can with them. I wouldn‚Äôt say it was more tiring; my body is feeling as good as it has ever felt in my career and that‚Äôs why I‚Äôm going to the World Championship. I want to keep playing important games for next year. I‚Äôm excited to keep doing as much as I can to help the team reach new highs that we know we can reach,‚Äù he stated.Mike Matheson was grateful for the support from his wife, Emily Matheson, a former U.S. women's national team member who competed in several World Championships and Olympics. Her appreciation for the importance of serving one's country has enabled Mike to embrace the national team invitation, despite having two children at home.Also read: ‚ÄúThe pain now is not even close to the joy that‚Äôs coming‚Äù: Coach Martin St. Louis on Montreal Canadiens' playoff loss Matheson is steadfast in his conviction that steady growth and responsibility are the true keys to long-term success as he hopes to instill the same in the Montreal Canadiens' new core.
Article Summary: Montreal canadiens defenseman mike matheson is heading to the world championship. The 31-year-old says his body is feeling as good as it has ever felt in his career. He thinks that if the montreal canadiens want to repeat this year's success without evolving, they'll get a wake-up call.

Article Title: IPL 2025: Kavya Maran's priceless reaction goes viral during SRH vs DC match
Article Text:
Kavya Maran

Go Beyond The Boundary with our YouTube channel. SUBSCRIBE NOW!

Shreyas Iyer's tactical call to promote Josh Inglis pays off: Ricky Ponting

During the 55th IPL 2025 league match between Sunrisers Hyderabad and Delhi Capitals at Rajiv Gandhi International Stadium on Monday, a run-out incident involving Vipraj Nigam sparked animated reactions from SRH owner Kavya Maran , which have gone viral on social media.The dismissal occurred in the 13th over of DC's innings when a miscommunication between Nigam and Tristan Stubbs led to Nigam's run-out while attempting to take two runs. Nigam had scored 18 runs off 17 balls, including one four and one six.Maran's expressive reaction to the dismissal was captured on camera and quickly became a talking point on social media platforms, with multiple Twitter users sharing clips of her response.Before his dismissal, Nigam had formed a crucial 33-run partnership for the sixth wicket with Stubbs, helping Delhi Capitals recover from a precarious position of 29 for 5 in 7.1 overs.The incident gained significant attention as Star Sports, the official broadcaster, highlighted Maran's reaction with the caption: "IPL Race 2 Playoffs got everyone excited: Kavya Maran's face says it all. Watch the LIVE action on Star Sports 1, Star Sports 1 Hindi & JioHotstar!"Sunrisers Hyderabad won the toss and opted to bowl first against Delhi Capitals, a decision that paid immediate dividends. Delhi‚Äôs innings got off to a disastrous start, reeling at 26 for 4 at the end of the powerplay ‚Äì the second-lowest powerplay score of the season. Only SRH‚Äôs own 24 for 4 against Mumbai Indians at the same venue ranks lower. Pat Cummins led from the front, striking thrice inside the first three overs to leave Delhi in tatters early on.
Article Summary: Sunrisers hyderabad owner kavya maran's reaction to vipraj nigam's run-out has gone viral on social media. Nigam had scored 18 runs off 17 balls, including one four and one six. Srh won the toss and opted to bowl first against delhi capitals.

Article Title: Jeff Teague says even Atlanta Hawks fans turned on him after his 2016 playoff shove on LeBron James
Article Text:
(Image Source - Getty Images)

Jeff Teague reflects on fan backlash following 2016 playoff incident with LeBron James

In the 2016 NBA Playoffs , Atlanta Hawks ' point guard Jeff Teague gave a strong shove to LeBron James of the Cleveland Cavaliers , knocking him into the stands during Game 3 of their Eastern Conference Semifinals. This move came from Teague's frustration over previous playoff losses, but he was surprised by the backlash he faced from both Cavs fans and his own Hawks crowd. Years later, Teague reflects on that moment and the surprising responses it generated.Recently on the Club 520 Podcast, Jeff Teague shared the memorable incident when he pushed LeBron James out of bounds during the final moments of Game 3 in the 2016 Eastern Conference Semifinals. The Hawks were about to face another playoff sweep by the Cavaliers, and Teague's frustration reached its peak. "We was losing. Sh*t I'm a sore loser. I ain't win a playoff game against him ever. I was sick of this sh*t.... I got so much hate mail... that was my first time deleting Instagram" Teague admitted. He added that seeing Atlanta fans cheer for LeBron in their home arena intensified his emotions, leading to the impulsive foul.Teague got a flagrant 1 foul for the shove, but it didn't stop there. He was flooded with hate mail, which led him to delete his Instagram for the first time. What really shocked him was how little support he got from Hawks fans. "I thought the fans was gonna ride with me. I was like, 'Stand up, Hawks fans.' They were like, 'Nah, that's the King,'" he recalled.Teague was really frustrated because the Hawks kept losing in the playoffs to LeBron's teams. In the 2014-15 season, Atlanta had an amazing 60 wins but got swept by the Cavaliers in the Eastern Conference Finals. The next year, they faced the same outcome in the semifinals. LeBron was on fire, averaging 30.3 points, 11.0 rebounds, and 9.3 assists per game in the 2015 series.Reflecting on those matchups, Teague acknowledged the challenge of facing LeBron at his peak. "LeBron was just too dominant, man. Like, y'all, you can see him now from the USA game," Teague said. "He's 40 years old now. He's still the most dominant player in the league. Ten years ago, we didn't have a chance. We ain't stand a chance for him, man. He's just too dominant, man, too dominant."Also Read: ‚ÄúWe getting a chance to see who can really hoop‚Äù ‚Äî Dwyane Wade backs referees for letting physicality play out The push on LeBron James was frustrating, but it really showed how complicated fan loyalty can be and how tough it is to go up against one of the best players ever.
Article Summary: Jeff teague pushed lebron james out of bounds during the final moments of game 3 in the 2016 eastern conference semifinals. Teague got a flagrant 1 foul for the shove, but it didn't stop there. He was flooded with hate mail, which led him to delete his instagram.

Article Title: 2025 NHL playoff preview: Dallas Stars vs Winnipeg Jets round 2 dates and game times
Article Text:
Images via Getty

Dallas Stars vs Winnipeg Jets: A closer look at the round 2 playoff matchup

Full playoff schedule: A look at the dates and times

Game 1: May 7 (Wednesday) ‚Äì Dallas at Winnipeg ‚Äì 8:30 PM



Game 2: May 9 (Friday) ‚Äì Dallas at Winnipeg ‚Äì 8:30 PM



Game 3: May 11 (Sunday) ‚Äì Winnipeg at Dallas ‚Äì 3:30 PM



Game 4: May 13 (Tuesday) ‚Äì Winnipeg at Dallas ‚Äì 7:00 PM



Game 5: May 15 (Thursday) ‚Äì Dallas at Winnipeg ‚Äì TBD



Game 6: May 17 (Saturday) ‚Äì Winnipeg at Dallas ‚Äì TBD



Game 7: May 19 (Monday) ‚Äì Dallas at Winnipeg ‚Äì TBD



The Dallas Stars are set to face a tough challenge as they advance to the second round of the 2025 NHL playoffs . After an intense seven-game series against the Colorado Avalanche , the Stars have earned a hard-fought spot in the next round, where they'll meet the Presidents' Trophy-winning Winnipeg Jets . With key players like Miro Heiskanen and Jason Robertson expected to return during the series, the Stars are gearing up for what promises to be an exciting, high-stakes matchup. Here‚Äôs a look at the full playoff schedule and what fans can expect in this pivotal round.The Winnipeg Jets , who also triumphed in seven games over the St. Louis Blues, have been dominant all season, clinching the prestigious Presidents' Trophy . While their recent series was a nail-biter, their high-level performance throughout the year makes them a formidable opponent for the Stars.However, Dallas isn‚Äôt backing down. The return of Miro Heiskanen and Jason Robertson is a significant lift for the Stars, offering renewed optimism that they can rise to the occasion and challenge the Jets' powerful lineup. With their skill sets and experience, both players are expected to play key roles in helping Dallas compete at the highest level against such a strong opponent. Their presence is expected to make a significant difference, but the road ahead is still steep. The Stars know this won't be an easy task, but they are ready for the challenge.Below is the schedule for the Stars' upcoming second-round matchup against the Winnipeg Jets. Bolded dates signify home games for Dallas, and italicized times are to be confirmed if needed. All game times are listed in Central Time.The first four games will be scheduled later due to the Florida Panthers vs. Toronto Maple Leafs series. These later times mean a lot of late-night action for fans, especially for those following both series.Also Read: 2025 NHL draft: Top prospects and key movers ahead of the lottery After facing the Colorado Avalanche in such an intense series, the Stars now set their sights on the Jets. The series promises to be full of excitement, with both teams looking to secure a spot in the next round. Dallas will need all hands on deck, and the return of key players like Heiskanen and Robertson will surely make a difference. As the Stars face off against the top team in the regular season, it‚Äôs clear this matchup will be one to watch.
Article Summary: The dallas stars advance to the second round of the 2025 nhl playoffs. They will face the presidents' trophy-winning winnipeg jets. The return of miro heiskanen and jason robertson is a significant lift for the stars. The series promises to be full of excitement, with both teams looking to secure a spot in the next round.

Article Title: Sherrone Moore‚Äôs suspension smells of strategic damage control
Article Text:
Michigan sidelines coach Moore for two games amid controversy (Image via: Getty Images)

Why Sherrone Moore‚Äôs sudden suspension feels like a PR move

Postgame Interview: Michigan HC Sherrone Moore on UPSETTING Ohio State, postgame scuffle and more

Michigan‚Äôs controversy deepens ahead of NCAA decision



The University of Michigan isn‚Äôt just calling audibles on the field, it‚Äôs doing it behind closed doors, too. As college football braces for yet another controversy-filled season, the Wolverines have issued a self-imposed two-game suspension for head coach Sherrone Moore . But this move feels less like discipline and more like a calculated distraction. The timing, conveniently placed during low-risk matchups, raises eyebrows and signals that Michigan might be more concerned with optics than true accountability.Michigan announced it will suspend Moore for two games, not to start the season, but right in the softest part of their schedule. He‚Äôll sit out Week 3 and Week 4 against Central Michigan and Nebraska, conveniently steering clear of any high-stakes matchups. He‚Äôll be free to coach against Oklahoma and New Mexico, the latter being especially notable considering Moore's own playing history at Oklahoma. That‚Äôs not coincidence, that‚Äôs choreography.The reason behind the suspension is allegedly deleting a 52-message text chain with former staffer Connor Stalions , the central figure in a brewing sign-stealing scandal . The deletion reportedly took place the same day the scandal hit the headlines. If that doesn‚Äôt raise a red flag, nothing will.The move looks less like accountability and more like a smokescreen. Michigan‚Äôs athletic department isn‚Äôt denying wrongdoing, they're just hoping to control the narrative before the NCAA does. But this isn‚Äôt damage control; it‚Äôs damage delay.The silence from the NCAA so far is deafening, but it won‚Äôt last. They‚Äôre watching. And if Michigan thinks it can run the clock out on this investigation with a couple of sacrificial Saturdays, they may be in for a rude awakening.This is the same program that suspended Jim Harbaugh for three games last year while letting him coach practices like nothing ever happened. The playbook hasn‚Äôt changed, only the names have. Moore‚Äôs absence won‚Äôt change Michigan‚Äôs win-loss column much, but it says volumes about what the program values: appearance over integrity. While players chase trophies, leadership seems more focused on staying one step ahead of a scandal that‚Äôs catching up fast.Also Read: Inside NFL Draft-Day drama: Did Chargers play hardball with Eagles over Omarion Hampton? This isn't just about one assistant coach or a few deleted texts. It‚Äôs about a culture that seems increasingly willing to trade ethics for edge. And unless someone blows the whistle loud enough, don‚Äôt expect Michigan to stop calling its own penalties.The scoreboard might not show it yet, but Michigan is already taking losses off the field, and in plain sight.
Article Summary: Michigan has suspended head coach sherrone moore for two games amid a sign-stealing scandal. The move looks less like accountability and more like a smokescreen. This isn't just about one assistant coach or a few deleted texts. It's about a culture that seems increasingly willing to trade ethics for edge.

Article Title: Will Stephen Curry play tonight against the Houston Rockets in Game 7? Latest update on the Golden State Warriors star's injury report (May 4, 2025)
Article Text:
Stephen Curry (Image via Imagn)

Golden State Warriors

Stephen Curry‚Äôs status for Game 7 - Will he play tonight against the Houston Rockets (May 4, 2025)?

Houston Rockets injury report for tonight‚Äôs game against the Golden State Warriors (May 4, 2025)

When and where to watch the Golden State Warriors play tonight against the Houston Rockets (May 4, 2025)?

Golden State Warriors vs Houston Rockets Game 6 overview

Thewill have Stephen Curry available for tonight‚Äôs high-stakes Game 7 against the Houston Rockets, despite the superstar guard continuing to play through a right thumb injury.Stephen Curry, who has been wearing a splint to protect the thumb, remains on the injury report but is fully cleared to play. His status hasn‚Äôt changed since Game 6, signaling that the issue isn‚Äôt severe enough to limit him in the winner-take-all matchup. Teammate Gary Payton II is also available despite dealing with a left thumb splint.The Warriors, who once led the series 3-1, now face immense pressure to avoid a historic collapse reminiscent of their 2016 Finals loss. Stephen Curry‚Äôs health is critical as Golden State leans on his championship experience to counter Houston‚Äôs surging momentum. The Rockets forced Game 7 after a dominant Game 6 win, fueled by Fred VanVleet‚Äôs offense and Steven Adams‚Äô impact off the bench.Houston remains without Jock Landale (right knee contusion) and Jae‚ÄôSean Tate (right ankle impingement), though neither was expected to play major postseason minutes. Meanwhile, Warriors forward Jimmy Butler, previously listed with a pelvic contusion, has been removed from the injury report entirely.Tip-off is set for 7:30 p.m. CT, with the winner advancing to face the Minnesota Timberwolves in the second round. All eyes will be on Stephen Curry to see if his thumb‚Äîand his shooting‚Äîhold up under playoff pressure.The Houston Rockets defeated the Golden State Warriors 115-107 in Game 6 of their playoff series at the Chase Center, forcing a decisive Game 7. Fred VanVleet led the Rockets with 29 points, 8 rebounds, and 8 assists, shooting 6 of 9 from three-point range and a perfect 9-for-9 from the free-throw line. The Rockets exploited Golden State‚Äôs weakness inside by using a double-big lineup with centers Alperen ≈ûeng√ºn and Steven Adams, which overwhelmed the Warriors' lack of interior presence.Also read: Jonathan Kuminga‚Äôs status for Game 7: Will the Golden State Warriors star play tonight against the Houston Rocket? (May 4, 2025) Golden State struggled with effort and intensity, missing 15 of their first 16 shots in the fourth quarter, allowing Houston to build a 17-point lead. The Rockets' aggressive defense and effective zone defense also disrupted the Warriors' offense. Now, the series is tied 3-3, with Game 7 set to be played in Houston.
Article Summary: The houston rockets defeated the golden state warriors 115-107 in game 6 of their playoff series at the chase center. The series is tied 3-3, with game 7 set to be played in houston. Tip-off is set for 7:30 p.m. ct, with the winner advancing to face the minnesota timberwolves in the second round.

Article Title: WWE RAW preview and streaming details (05/05/25): Full match card, show highlights, how to watch, and more
Article Text:
(Image Via X/@WWE)

WWE Monday Night RAW: Confirmed match card

Seth Rollins, Bron Breakker, and Paul Heyman are to appear to deliver a message to the WWE Universe



Penta vs JD McDonagh



Rusev vs Otis



Becky Lynch to appear



Iyo Sky vs Roxanne Perez



Seth Rollins, Bron Breakker, and Paul Heyman are to appear to deliver a message to the WWE Universe

Iyo Sky vs Roxanne Perez

How to watch WWE Monday Night RAW? (May 5, 2025)

WWE Monday Night Raw is back again with another intense episode. This action-packed night will feature a surprising storyline, an intense feud, and more, just like the previous RAW match of April 28, 2025. The show will mainly feature the developments that transpired at the previous RAW match.The May 5, 2025, episode of Monday Night Raw will emanate live from the Chi Health Center in Omaha, Nebraska, USA, and will be available on Netflix at 8 ET/5 PT, and other broadcasting platforms globally.This week, RAW will deliver some major storyline development as it will feature superstars like Seth Rollins , Bron Breakker, and Paul Heyman , Penta, Becky Lynch , and others will appear tonight in Omaha. In addition, the Red Brand will also witness a match between Iyo Sky and Roxanne Perez . Let‚Äôs take a look at the match preview, streaming details, match card, highlights, and more.Just like the previous edition of RAW, Seth Rollins, Paul Heyman, and Bron Breakker are to appear on WWE‚Äôs Red Brand Tonight. According to WWE‚Äôs RAW Manager Adam Pearce , this new and powerful alliance has a message for the WWE Universe. Fans are waiting in anticipation to witness what drama unfolds as the trio graces the ring in Omaha, Nebraska, tonight.In this edition of WWE RAW, the Women's World Champion Iyo Sky will compete against Roxanne Perez. Last week on NXT, The Genius of the Sky defeated Roxanne Perez in a tag match. Now, she will try to defeat The Prodigy back-to-back. However, the duo will face each other this time in a singles tournament.Not only these, WWE star Penta will be seen in an intense fight with JD McDonagh, while Rusev will compete in his first WWE match in years. Becky Lynch will also appear tonight on WWE Monday Night RAW in an exciting segment.-Tonight's WWE Monday Night RAW episode will air live in the United States at 8 PM ET and 5 PM PT on Netflix, while fans in the UK can watch it at 1 AM GMT.-In Canada, the show will be broadcast live every Monday at 8 PM ET on Netflix.-Fans in Ireland can watch the show live at 1 AM GMT every Tuesday on Netflix.-In India, RAW will be available live every Tuesday at 5:30 AM IST on Netflix.Also Read: WWE announces Crown Jewel 2025 to be held in Australia instead of Saudi Arabia | WWE News - The Times of India -Viewers in Saudi Arabia can watch the show live at 3 AM AST every Tuesday on Netflix.-In Australia, the show will be broadcast live every Tuesday at 10 AM AEDT on Netflix.-Fans in France can tune in live every Tuesday at 2 AM CET on AB1.
Article Summary: The may 5, 2025, episode of monday night raw will emanate live from the chi health center in omaha, nebraska, usa, and will be available on netflix at 8 et/5 pt, and other broadcasting platforms globally. This week, raw will deliver some major storyline development as it will feature superstars like seth rollins, bron breakker, and paul heyman, penta, becky lynch, and others.

Article Title: IPL match today, GT vs SRH: Team prediction, head-to-head, Narendra Modi Stadium pitch report, Ahmedabad weather update
Article Text:
Gujarat Titans' captain Shubman Gill during a practice session ahead of the Indian Premier League (IPL) 2025 cricket match against Sunrisers Hyderabad. (PTI)

Go Beyond The Boundary with our YouTube channel.

Poll Which team do you believe has the better chances of making the playoffs? Sunrisers Hyderabad Gujarat Titans

GT vs SRH: Pitch Report

GT vs SRH: Predicted playing XIs

GT predicted XI:

SRH Predicted XI:

GT vs SRH: Head-to-head

Matches played: 5

GT won: 4

SRH won: 1

Last result: Gujarat Titans won by 7 wickets (April 2025)

GT vs SRH: Ahmedabad Weather Report

GT vs SRH: Live streaming details

Gujarat Titans aim to recover from the blow dealt by young sensation Vaibhav Suryavanshi when they face a struggling Sunrisers Hyderabad in an IPL match tonight (May 2).Suryavanshi stunned GT with his incredible performance, hitting the season‚Äôs fastest century in just 35 balls and becoming the youngest IPL centurion at only 14 years and 32 days old.Despite an eight-wicket loss ‚Äî post a strong 209/4 score ‚Äî the result hasn't altered GT's position in the league. The Titans remain one of the most consistent teams this season, boasting a balanced squad with strengths in both batting and bowling.Led by Shubman Gill, they sit comfortably with six wins out of nine matches (12 points). Just two more wins from their last five fixtures would secure a spot in the playoffs, reaching the 16-point threshold.GT's in-form top order gives them confidence, especially with standout Sai Sudharsan, who is second in the Orange Cap race with 456 runs and five fifties. Gill (389 runs) and Jos Buttler (406 runs) also rank among the season‚Äôs top batters, making a formidable trio despite recent challenges.Earlier this season, GT defeated SRH convincingly in Hyderabad by seven wickets, thanks largely to Mohammed Siraj's impressive 4/17 spell. They‚Äôll be hoping for a similar performance this time.Meanwhile, SRH find themselves in a critical position, needing wins urgently. The runners-up last season have struggled ‚Äî just three wins in nine matches ‚Äî and sit ninth on the points table. Another loss could effectively eliminate their playoff hopes.While SRH have seen flashes of brilliance from openers Abhishek Sharma and Travis Head, consistency remains elusive for the team.The pitch at Narendra Modi Stadium favours the batters, which should benefit SRH. In five of the eight matches played at Motera, teams have scored over 200 runs, highlighting the batting-friendly conditions. Bowlers are likely to struggle, particularly in the second innings, as dew is expected to make an impact.Shubman Gill (C), Sai Sudharsan, Jos Buttler (WK), Sherfane Rutherford, Shahrukh Khan, Washington Sundar, Rahul Tewatia, Rashid Khan, Sai Kishore, Mohammed Siraj, Prasidh KrishnaImpact sub: Karim Janat/Ishant SharmaTravis Head, Abhishek Sharma, Ishan Kishan, Nitish Kumar Reddy, Heinrich Klaasen (WK), Aniket Verma, Kamindu Mendis, Pat Cummins (C), Harshal Patel, Simarjeet Singh, Zeeshan AnsariImpact sub: Mohammed ShamiGujarat Titans squad : Shubman Gill (Captain), Jos Buttler (wk), B Sai Sudharsan, Shahrukh Khan, Sherfane Rutherford, Rahul Tewatia, Rashid Khan, Kagiso Rabada, Ravisrinivasan Sai Kishore, Mohammad Siraj, Prasidh Krishna, Ishant Sharma, Washington Sundar, Glenn Phillips, Anuj Rawat, Mahipal Lomror, Arshad Khan, Jayant Yadav, Nishant Sindhu, Kulwant Khejroliya, Gerald Coetzee, Manav Suthar, Kumar Kushagra, Gurnoor Brar and Karim Janat.Sunrisers Hyderabad squad : Pat Cummins (c), Ishan Kishan (wk), Atharva Taide, Abhinav Manohar, Aniket Verma, Sachin Baby, Smaran Ravichandran, Heinrich Klaasen (wk), Travis Head, Harshal Patel, Kamindu Mendis, Wiaan Mulder, Abhishek Sharma, Nitish Kumar Reddy, Mohammed Shami, Rahul Chahar, Simarjeet Singh, Zeeshan Ansari, Jaydev Unadkat, Eshan Malinga.In Ahmedabad on Friday, temperatures are expected to be quite hot, reaching up to 44¬∞C during the day. AccuWeather forecasts hazy sunshine and dangerous heat. By evening, the temperature will drop to around 33¬∞C when the match begins, and then further decrease to about 28¬∞C overnight.Gujarat Titans vs Sunrisers Hyderabad will be broadcast live on Star Sports Network. It will be available for live streaming on JioStar - app and website.
Article Summary: Gujarat titans face sunrisers hyderabad in an ipl match tonight. Titans aim to recover from the blow dealt by young sensation vaibhav suryavanshi. Srh find themselves in a critical position, needing wins urgently. Another loss could effectively eliminate their playoff hopes.

Article Title: MCA to inaugurate Rohit Sharma, Ajit Wadekar and Sharad Pawar stands on May 13
Article Text:
Mumbai: Mumbai Indians' Rohit Sharma in action during a practice session on the eve of their IPL T20 cricket match against Gujarat Titans at Wankhede Stadium, in Mumbai. (PTI Photo/Kunal Patil)

Mumbai:

Go Beyond The Boundary with our YouTube channel. SUBSCRIBE NOW!

Bombay Sport Exchange Ep 4: Prof. Ratnakar Shetty on BCCI, cricket politics & Indian cricket's growth

The Mumbai Cricket Association (MCA) will inaugurate stands named after India's Test and ODI captain Rohit Sharma , former India captain Ajit Wadekar , and ex-ICC, BCCI, and MCA chief Sharad Pawar on May 13.In its 86th Annual General Meeting on April 15, the MCA had decided to name stands after Rohit, Wadekar , and Pawar.The Divecha Pavilion Level 3 stand will be named after Rohit, who led India to the T20 World Cup title last year in the USA and West Indies, and the ICC Champions Trophy in the UAE in February-March.The Grand Stand Level 4 will be named the Ajit Wadekar Stand, after the former India captain, who led India to maiden Test series victories in the West Indies and England in 1971.These significant overseas wins marked a turning point in Indian cricket‚Äôs international journey. Wadekar represented India in 37 Test matches and two One Day Internationals between 1966 and 1974. He played 237 first-class matches. His contribution to Indian cricket remains legendary. He passed away in August 2018 at the age of 77.The Grand Stand Level 3 will be named the Pawar Stand, as Pawar, regarded as the MCA's 'mentor,' is widely respected for his highly successful tenure as the MCA president from 2001 to 2013, and then from 2013 to 2016, during which the association hosted the 2011 World Cup final at the revamped Wankhede Stadium .
Article Summary: The mumbai cricket association (mca) will inaugurate stands named after india's test and odi captain rohit sharma, former india captain ajit wadekar, and ex-icc, bcci, and mca chief sharad pawar on may 13. The divecha pavilion level 3 stand will be named after rohit, who led india to the t20 world cup title last year in the usa and west indies, and the icc champions trophy in the uae in february-march.

Article Title: Mohammed Shami gets death threat; FIR registered
Article Text:
Mohammed Shami

Go Beyond The Boundary with our YouTube channel. SUBSCRIBE NOW!



Powerplay collapse cost us the game: LSG‚Äôs Ayush Badoni after loss to PBKS

Indian pacer Mohammed Shami received a death threat via email on Sunday, prompting an FIR registration at the Cyber Crime Police Station in Uttar Pradesh's Amroha district. The complaint, filed by Shami's brother Haseeb, identified Rajput Sindar as the sender who demanded a ransom of Rs one crore from the cricketer currently playing in IPL 2025 with Sunrisers Hyderabad .The FIR was registered on Monday following the Superintendent of Police's orders under sections 308(4) of Indian Penal Code (BNS) 2023, and sections 66d and 66e of Information Technology (Amendment) Act, 2008.Shami's performance in IPL 2025 has seen him take six wickets in nine matches for SRH at an average of 56.17. He recently showed impressive form in India's Champions Trophy victory, claiming nine wickets in five matches, including a five-wicket haul against Bangladesh in Dubai.Indian team head coach Gautam Gambhir also faced similar threats via email last month. The Delhi Police are investigating the case, with Gambhir already under police protection.Quiz: Who's that IPL player? "We have been informed about an alleged threat mail received on an email ID associated with Gautam Gambhir. The matter is being investigated. Gautam Gambhir is already under Delhi Police protection, and we do not comment on specific security arrangements," said DCP (Central) V. Harsha Vardhan.Gambhir's threat followed a terror attack in Jammu and Kashmir 's Pahalgam that resulted in 26 deaths and multiple injuries."As we spoke, please find below the 'Threat Mails' received on the mail ID of Mr Gautam Gambhir (Ex-MP), Head Coach, Indian Cricket Team . Kindly register the F.l.R accordingly and ensure the safety and security of the family," wrote Gambhir's PS to Rajender Nagar SHO and DCP, Central.The authorities are actively investigating both threats against the prominent cricket figures.
Article Summary: Indian pacer mohammed shami received a death threat via email on sunday. The sender demanded a ransom of rs one crore from the cricketer. Shami is currently playing in ipl 2025 with sunrisers hyderabad. Indian team head coach gautam gambhir also faced similar threats last month.

Article Title: Virat Kohli creates history, becomes first ever to achieve this big IPL feat
Article Text:
Royal Challengers Bengaluru's Virat Kohli plays a shot. (PTI Photo)

Go Beyond The Boundary with our YouTube channel.

Poll What do you attribute Kohli's consistent performance to? Support from the team Experience and strategy Fitness and discipline Skill and talent

Astrologer Greenstone Lobo: Is Yuzvendra Chahal's India career over?

Most 500+ run seasons in IPL history



8 - Virat Kohli

7 - David Warner

6 - KL Rahul

5 - Shikhar Dhawan

NEW DELHI: Virat Kohli continues to redefine consistency and class in the Indian Premier League , becoming the first player in tournament history to score 500 or more runs in eight different seasons.The Royal Challengers Bengaluru ( RCB ) star crossed the milestone with a scintillating 62 off 33 balls against Chennai Super Kings ( CSK ) at the M Chinnaswamy Stadium on Saturday, reclaiming the Orange Cap in the process.With 505 runs from 11 innings at an average of 63.13 and a strike rate of 143.46, Kohli leads the run-scoring charts in IPL 2025 .The knock against CSK marked his seventh half-century of the season, underlining his exceptional form. Kohli's performance helped RCB edge out CSK by two runs in a high-scoring thriller, as the hosts successfully defended 213, restricting CSK to 211/5. The win also marked RCB‚Äôs first-ever league double over their southern rivals, following their historic 50-run win in Chennai.Also See: RR vs KKR Live Score IPL 2025 Previously tied with David Warner on seven 500-plus seasons, Kohli now stands alone at the top.Kohli began this streak in 2011 with 557 runs and followed up with consistent tallies in 2013 (634), 2015 (505), and the historic 2016 season where he amassed a record-breaking 973 runs, including four centuries. He repeated the feat in 2018, and then in consecutive seasons ‚Äî 2023 (639 runs) and 2024 (741 runs) ‚Äî before extending it again this year.KL Rahul (six times) and Shikhar Dhawan (five times) are next on the all-time list of most 500-run IPL seasons, but Kohli‚Äôs unmatched longevity and hunger for runs continue to set him apart.
Article Summary: Virat kohli becomes first player in ipl history to score 500 or more runs in eight different seasons. Royal challengers bengaluru star crossed the milestone with a scintillating 62 off 33 balls against chennai super kings ( csk ) at the m chinnaswamy stadium on saturday.

Article Title: "He‚Äôs just a loverboy": Connor McDavid‚Äôs heartwarming moment with Calvin Pickard goes viral after Kings win
Article Text:
Connor McDavid is gearing up to face the Vegas Golden Knights.(Image via Sam Navarro-Imagn Images)

Connor McDavid's heartwarming video with Calvin Pickard goes viral and fans are excited about it



Connor McDavid, the captain of the Edmonton Oilers, was ecstatic as his team won the playoff match against the Los Angeles Kings. While many fans were pretty stressed if the Edmonton Oilers would be able to pull it off, the team shocked everyone. Now, a video of Connor McDavid has gone viral from the match against the Los Angeles Kings and fans are here for it.Recently, a video posted by Sportsnet on X shows Connor McDavid excited as he tightly hugs Calvin Pickard, the goaltender of the Edmonton Oilers. The video shows both the star players of the Edmonton Oilers excited as they recorded a win against the Los Angeles Kings.A fan commented, ‚Äúhonestly, i think collectively we would ALL do this to Picks if we were given the chance‚Äù, while another fan wrote, ‚Äúwho said your life can‚Äôt start at 33 he‚Äôs just a kidüò≠‚ÄùA third fan joked, ‚Äúinject this into my veins‚Äù, while another fan wrote, ‚Äúhe loves them all hes just a lil loverboy‚Äù.Another fan commented, ‚ÄúHad to come back to this because I am LAUGHING.ü§≠‚Äù, while a fifth fan joked, ‚Äúhe ain‚Äôt ever show skinner that loveü§£‚ÄùAnother fan wrote, ‚ÄúFinally gets some saves when we need it‚Äù.After the Edmonton Oilers won against the Los Angeles Kings, Connor McDavid credited his teammates for the win.Connor McDavid said, ‚ÄúJust digging in. Just willed it out. (Its) not easy to beat a team four years straight‚Ä¶Picks (Pickard) gave us a chance to win every night. Played great these last four games.‚ÄùThe Edmonton Oilers‚Äô captain continued, ‚ÄúBrownie (Connor Brown) is obviously a big part of that penalty kill and they were great. Massive kill in the third and he pitches in with some offense as well.‚ÄùWith the playoff series against the Vegas Golden Knights beginning soon, fans are pretty stressed about the situation. After the win against the Kings, Connor McDavid had also spoken to Sportsnet about beating the Vegas Golden Knights.The first match against the Vegas Golden Knights is scheduled to be held on Tuesday night.Also Read: ‚ÄúVegas a different beast‚Äù: Oilers captain Connor McDavid looks ahead to Vegas series but fans doubt a win is possible
Article Summary: Connor mcdavid's heartwarming video with calvin pickard goes viral and fans are excited about it. The video shows both the star players of the edmonton oilers excited as they recorded a win against the los angeles kings. Connor mcdavid credited his teammates for the win.

Article Title: Wordle today #1416: Get hints and answer to today's puzzle May 5, 2025
Article Text:
Wordle May 5, 2025: Here‚Äôs today‚Äôs hints, clues, and answer

How did Wordle originate

Where can you play Wordle





How to play Wordle

Wordle FAQs

Can I play past Wordle puzzles?

No, Wordle is designed as a daily game with a unique puzzle each day. While you can‚Äôt play past puzzles on the official site, there are unofficial Wordle archives available where you can play previous games.

How do the color-coded tiles work in Wordle?

Green means the letter is correct and in the correct position.

Yellow means the letter is correct but in the wrong position.

Gray means the letter is not in the word at all.

How many guesses do I get in Wordle?

You have six chances to guess the correct five-letter word. After each guess, you receive feedback to help guide your next attempt.

Can I play Wordle more than once per day?

Wordle is designed as a daily puzzle, so you can only play one puzzle per day. The word of the day is the same for everyone globally, and once you complete it, you‚Äôll have to wait until the next day for a new puzzle.

Can letters repeat in Wordle?

Yes, repeated letters can appear in Wordle answers. Words containing duplicate letters can present more of a challenge when solving.

Is Wordle available in other languages?

Yes, there are multiple versions of Wordle available in various languages, including Spanish, French, and German. You can switch to a different language by finding the corresponding version of the game online.

Wordle is a popular word puzzle game that challenges players to guess a five-letter word within six attempts. Developed by Josh Wardle, this simple yet addictive game has taken the world by storm with its easy-to-understand rules and daily challenges. Each guess provides feedback with colored tiles: green indicates the correct letter in the correct spot, yellow signals the correct letter in the wrong spot, and gray means the letter isn't in the word. Wordle‚Äôs mix of logic and vocabulary makes it a daily brain teaser loved by millions worldwide. The game's minimalist design and once-a-day format have contributed to its viral success. It also fosters friendly competition, as players often share their results on social media without giving away the answer.The Wordle puzzle can be tricky to solve, which is likely why you‚Äôve found yourself here, struggling to crack today‚Äôs challenge. As always, today‚Äôs NYT Wordle was full of surprises, but don‚Äôt worry‚Äîwe‚Äôre here to help. Below, you‚Äôll find some helpful clues for today‚Äôs Wordle answer , and if those don‚Äôt do the trick, keep reading to discover the solution directly. Sometimes the word includes uncommon letters or double letters that throw players off. Using strong starter words like ‚ÄúSLATE‚Äù or ‚ÄúCRANE‚Äù can improve your chances of solving the puzzle quickly.Today‚Äôs Wordle promises a puzzle that tests your linguistic skills, likely to be decoded by many participants. To assist you in solving the puzzle, we've curated a fresh array of hints and clues for today's Wordle challenge.Whether you have cracked the code or are still working with the hints, it is now time to reveal the answer. Drumroll please, as we unveil the answer for Wordle.Wordle was initially developed by engineer Josh Wardle as a thoughtful gift for his partner. However, it quickly gained massive popularity, turning into a global sensation with thousands of players engaging daily. The game's success inspired fans to create various spin-offs, such as the battle royale-style Squabble, the music identification game Heardle, and multi-word challenges like Dordle and Quordle. Its simplicity, paired with daily novelty, made it a part of many people's morning routine.The viral appeal also sparked academic interest in its psychological and linguistic impact.As its popularity soared, The New York Times acquired Wordle, and it became a hit on social media platforms like TikTok, where creators even livestream their gameplay sessions.Wordle isn't available as an app; it can only be played through a web browser. To play, simply visit the New York Times Games website.Originally hosted on its own site and created by Josh Wardle, Wordle was acquired by the New York Times in February of this year. One of the great aspects of Wordle is that it‚Äôs ad-free, allowing you to fully concentrate on the word-guessing game.To play Wordle, visit the link https://www.nytimes.com/games/wordle/index.html and begin guessing words.
Article Summary: Wordle was initially developed by engineer josh wardle as a thoughtful gift for his partner. However, it quickly gained massive popularity, turning into a global sensation. You have six chances to guess the correct five-letter word. After each guess, you receive feedback to help guide your next attempt.

How to play NYT Connections



Don't analyse the connections too deeply.

The game tends to employ simple links such as sounding similar, similar spellings, or common themes.

Example: "dear" and "deer" tend to be linked by sound, not by some elaborate relationship such as predator and prey.

You have only four guesses per puzzle per day, so every guess matters.

Don't mindlessly click‚Äîconsider each set carefully before submitting.

Try to come up with at least three connected words confidently before trying a set.

The initial organization is deliberately mischievous to mislead you.

Shuffling the words may allow you to see new patterns or concealed connections.

Shuffle it as a routine to begin and whenever you are stuck.

The game was developed under the guidance of associate puzzle editor Wyna Liu and has quickly gained popularity for its blend of logic, vocabulary, and creativity. Article Title: ‚ÄúI wish I could have wrestled‚Äù: WWE Hall of Famer Bret Hart expresses his wish to wrestle with Rey Mysterio
Article Text:
(Image Via WWE)

WWE Hall of Famer Bret Hart expresses missed opportunity to wrestle with Rey Mysterio

Also Read

WWE Hall of Famer Bret Hart has recently shared his admiration for fellow WWE star Rey Mysterio , expressing a deep regret that the two never faced each other in the ring. Bret Hart had a number of phenomenal matches but not against the former WWE Hall of Famer Rey Mysterio. He expressed that he wished to had a face off against someone like Mysterio.WWE star Rey Mysterio is a well-known figure in the wrestling industry and one of the foremost proponents of the Lucha Libre style of wrestling. Meanwhile, Bret Hart has discussed his appreciation for various wrestling styles and his desire to have challenged himself against a Lucha Libre-style wrestler like Mysterio.Let‚Äôs take a look at what the wrestler has to say about Rey Mysterio in a candid conversation WWE Hall of Famer Bret Hart has recently expressed his desire to engage in an intense feud with the proponent of the Lucha Libre style proponent, Rey Mysterio. He expressed the same in an interview with ‚ÄúThe Ringer Wrestling Show.‚ÄùDuring the candid conversation in the podcast, the WWE veteran emphasized his respect for Mysterio's in-ring abilities, calling him "one of the greatest wrestlers of all time" and highlighting his unique talent."There's all kinds of different styles and different ....You know, I wish I could have wrestled someone like Rey Mysterio. I never really wrestled a Lucha Libre style guy. I would love to have done some stuff, especially if I was a bad guy. I would've loved to have worked with Rey, although I did wrestle Owen and did a lot of high-flying stuff," said Hart. He further added, "You know, I was always a guy that liked a good challenge.‚ÄùHart also discussed in the interview how he loved exploring different kinds of wrestling styles, and one of them could be the Lucha Libre style of wrestling. Lucha Libre is a style of professional wrestling that originated in Mexico, which means free fight. This style represents a unique, high-energy wrestling tradition with high-flying moves , fast-paced action, and colorful masks.Though Bret Hart and Rey Mysteio were a part of WCW at the same time in the late '90s, they never got to face each other. However, they did collaborate together at a WWE house show during Hart's brief run back in the ring in 2010.
Article Summary: Wwe hall of famer bret hart expresses missed opportunity to wrestle with rey mysterio. He expressed that he wished to had a face off against someone like mysterio in the ring. Hart also discussed how he loved exploring different kinds of wrestling styles, and one of them could be the lucha libre style of wrestling.

Article Title: 'We missed you': Rohit Sharma presents T20 World Cup winning ring to Mohammad Siraj
Article Text:
Rohit Sharma and Mohammed Siraj. (Screengrabs)

Go Beyond The Boundary with our YouTube channel. SUBSCRIBE NOW!

Bombay Sport Exchange Ep 4: Prof. Ratnakar Shetty on BCCI, cricket politics & Indian cricket's growth

Team India captain Rohit Sharma on Monday presented the T20 World Cup winning ring Mohammed Siraj ahead of Mumbai Indians clash against Gujarat Titans at the Wankhede Stadium. Siraj had missed the ceremony held earlier this year during the BCCI's Naman Awards."This is for Mohammad Siraj ," Rohit Sharma said in a video posted by BCCI."We missed you at the function. You played a vital role in our T20 campaign."So I am proudly presenting him a very very special ring which was made for all of us. Unfortunately Siraj wasn't there so I would like to present this to Mr. Siraj."The video ended with Siraj flexing the medal and said: "Champion."Last year, India defeated South Africa in Barbados to lift the T20 World Cup title, country's first major success since the 2013 Champions Trophy.The customised ring features name and jersey number of players, with an Ashok chakra embedded on top."Presenting #TeamIndia with their CHAMPIONS RING to honour their flawless campaign in the #T20WorldCup.""Diamonds may be forever, but this win certainly is immortalised in a billion hearts. These memories will 'Ring' loud and live with us forever," BCCI had said on X.India managed to win the final despite South Africa at one stage needing just 30 runs off as many balls.After the final, India captain Rohit Sharma and star batter Virat Kohli announced their T20I retirements. A day later, all-rounder Ravindra Jadeja joined them in bidding adieu to the format.
Article Summary: Mohammed siraj missed the ceremony held earlier this year during the bcci's naman awards. India defeated south africa in barbados to lift the t20 world cup title, country's first major success since the 2013 champions trophy. The customised ring features name and jersey number of players, with an ashok chakra embedded on top.

Article Title: When will Darius Garland return? Find more details about his toe injury and latest updates on his next game
Article Text:
Darius Garland's toe injury may not be so minor. Source: X

Darius Garland's toe injury may keep him away from the next game



Darius Garland was unable to play in the Cavaliers' first game against the Indiana Pacers. His injury is quite serious, as he has a sprained big toe. According to Jared Greenberg, this type of injury would typically keep him out for one to two weeks during the regular season. Garland missed the last two games of the Cavaliers' first-round sweep of the Miami Heat, but fans widely believed that the time off would allow him to recover enough for the start of their series against the Pacers.It's no secret that Garland is still dealing with this concerning injury; he sustained a sprain to his left toe in Game 2 of Cleveland's first-round series against Miami. Although he missed Games 3 and 4 of that series, it didn't impact the outcome, as the Cavaliers won both games convincingly to eliminate the Heat.However, as the stakes go higher, the Cavaliers will need Garland to recover fast and be back in action to help them win. His continued absence may be more serious than a minor injury, as he hasn't been able to return to play despite Cleveland not having played since Monday, April 28. The initial hope was that Garland would be back for Game 1 against Indiana, but that didn't happen.It was reported that Garland was listed as a game-time decision, which does sound encouraging but he hasn't been able to do enough to be cleared to play in an actual game.Currently, Garland's status for this toe injury is day-to-day. However, Jared Greenberg of NBA TV reported that there is "significant concern" about the injury, and also added that if it were the regular season, Garland would have been "shut down for at least a week to two weeks."
Article Summary: Darius garland was unable to play in the cavaliers' first game against the indiana pacers. His injury is quite serious, as he has a sprained big toe. According to jared greenberg, this type of injury would typically keep him out for one to two weeks during the regular season.
